metadata.title: CVE-2014-3242 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SOAPpy 0.12.5 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a SOAPrequest containing an external entity declaration in conjunction with anentity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue.

criterions.comment: python-soappy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
